QuestData.Title: Master of Inner Calm
QuestData.Description:
You have come a long way.
You are almost prepared to access your inner calm anywhere.
Just one more journey under my guidance.
It is a short one. Peace was here in this garden all along.
One more location of calm to experience.
Then you shall shed your spiritual shackles.
I shall be proud.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the new meditation location within the Queen's Conservatory.

Objectives.Objective: Find the new meditation spot in the Garden
